SPECIAL OPS

Infiltrate a town in the dead of night, navigate through the winding streets of a suburb, defend an observatory from waves of enemies, destroy enemy communication servers and more with this evolved co-op experience.

Raids make their Midseason debut in MWII, challenging trios to complete a series of tasks that will require a mix of stealth, resource management, and puzzle-solving to ultimately uncover what’s at the center of the mysterious facility...
